<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.68

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if the given group marked for auto-deletion when empty. See [[deleteGroupWhenEmpty]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isGroupDeletedWhenEmpty''' group

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> group: [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] the group is marked for auto-deletion when empty

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_isMarked = [[isGroupDeletedWhenEmpty]] _group;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[deleteGroup]], [[deleteGroupWhenEmpty]], [[createGroup]], [[group]], [[setGroupId]], [[groupID]], [[units]], [[groupFromNetId]], [[netId]], [[leader]], [[selectLeader]], [[join]], [[createCenter]], [[createUnit]], [[createVehicle]], [[Side]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
